TranslationStrings.String: 重新生成自动标定工具

TranslationStrings.Key: Warning! Light controller {0} channel {1} failed to turn off. Details: {2}
TranslationStrings.String: 警告！光控制器{0}道{1}失败关闭。详细信息：{2}

TranslationStrings.Key: No cycle time data has been recorded yet. Cycle time statistics are reset at application launch.
TranslationStrings.String: 无循环时间数据被记录。 循环时间统计将在应用启动时被重置。

TranslationStrings.Key: Ran but provides no output image

TranslationStrings.String: 无循环时间数据被记录。 循环时间统计将在应用启动时被重置。

TranslationStrings.Key: One or more calibration toolblocks have errors! Please review the calibration toolblocks listed in red.
TranslationStrings.String: 一个或多个标定工具块有错误！请查看显示红色的标定工具块。
重新加载检查工具，请等候

TranslationStrings.Key: No framegrabber connected. Using default DeviceVendorName. Please manually edit the recipe.
TranslationStrings.String: 无图像采集卡连接。使用缺省设备供应商名称。请手动修改设定文档。

TranslationStrings.Key: Warning, could not load a camera recipe for all inspections. These new recipes will be marked with an asterisk (*). Please verify, then save these recipes.
TranslationStrings.String: 警告，对所有检查任务无法加载像机设定文档。这些新的设定将被标记上星号（*）。请确定后再保存像机设定文档。
步骤3：曝光率，聚焦度， 和视野

TranslationStrings.Key: Step 1: Select a Camera to Setup
TranslationStrings.String: 步骤1：选择像机进行设置

TranslationStrings.Key: Warning! Light controller {0} channel {1} failed to set a light intensity! Details: {2}
TranslationStrings.String: 警告！光源控制器{0}通道{1}无法设置光的强度！详细信息：{2}

TranslationStrings.Key: Warning! Light controller {0} channel {1} failed to turn on! Details: {2}
TranslationStrings.String: 警告！光源控制器{0}通道{1}无法打开！详细信息：{2}

TranslationStrings.Key: Would you like to pull the ToolBlock input values into your camera setup recipe?
TranslationStrings.String: 想要把工具块的输入值存到像机设定文档吗？

TranslationStrings.Key: Would you like to create this recipe using the current values? Click "Yes" to use the current values on the Camera Setup ToolBlock outputs, press "No" to use the target values stored in the Camera Setup ToolBlock inputs, or press "Cancel" to cancel saving the recipe.
TranslationStrings.String: 想要用当前值创建设定文档？点击“是“ 使用像机设置工具块输出的当前值， 点击”否“使用存储在像机设置工具块输入处的目标值， 或点击”取消“来取消保存设定文档。

TranslationStrings.Key: You must confirm the camera and lens setup by checking the box in step 2!
TranslationStrings.String: 必须在步骤2中选中复选框来确认像机和镜头设置。

TranslationStrings.Key: Confirm that the current image matches the reference image.
TranslationStrings.String: 确认当前图像和参考图像匹配。

TranslationStrings.Key: Not all cameras are OK. Are you sure you want to close Camera Setup Test?
TranslationStrings.String: 不是所有像机都运行良好。确定要关闭像机设定测试吗？

TranslationStrings.Key: Not all cameras are setup. Are you sure you want to close Camera Setup Test?
TranslationStrings.String: 不是所有像机都设置完成。确定要关闭像机设定测试吗？

TranslationStrings.Key: The password entered is not correct.
The old password entered is not correct.
Warning! Light controller {0} channel {1} failed to turn off! Details: {2}
TranslationStrings.String: 警告！光源控制器{0}通道{1}无法关闭！详细信息:{2)

TranslationStrings.Key: Image too dark, increase exposure time.
TranslationStrings.String: 图像太暗,需增加曝光时间

TranslationStrings.Key: Image too bright, reduce exposure time.
TranslationStrings.String: 图像太亮, 需减少曝光时间

TranslationStrings.Key: Place target in field of view. Ensure 2D code is readable.
TranslationStrings.String: 将目标放在视野中. 确保2D代码可读.

TranslationStrings.Key: Image too blurry. Adjust camera focus.
TranslationStrings.String: 图像太模糊. 调整镜头焦点

TranslationStrings.Key: Working distance is too long. Move camera closer to part.
TranslationStrings.String: 工作距离过长. 将像机移近。

TranslationStrings.Key: Target is not positioned correctly. Check target fixture or adjust camera.
TranslationStrings.String: 目标未正确放置。检查目标机器或者调整像机。

TranslationStrings.Key: Cannot determine max focus. Adjust camera focus.
TranslationStrings.String: 无法确定最大焦点。调整像机焦点。

TranslationStrings.Key: Working distance is too short. Move camera away from part.
TranslationStrings.String: 工作距离太短。将像机移远。

TranslationStrings.Key: Calibration tool failed, no output image provided. Check calibration tool.
TranslationStrings.String: 标定工具失败，无输出图像。 检查标定工具。
图像保存失败。存储队列已满。

TranslationStrings.Key: Acquisition tool failed, no input image provided. Check acquisition tool.
TranslationStrings.String: 拍照工具失败， 无输入图像。检查标定工具。

TranslationStrings.Key: Light controller {0} channel {1} failed to turn off.
TranslationStrings.String: 光源控制器{0}通道{1}无法打开。
视觉工具设置-检查{0} (产品 {1})
视觉工具设置- 标定{0}

TranslationStrings.Key: An uncaught exception occurred while running a job.
TranslationStrings.String: 工作运行中发生未知状况

TranslationStrings.Key: This label was added after RunJob was called!
TranslationStrings.String: 运行工作被调用后添加该标签！

TranslationStrings.Key: Free space on the specific disk is less then {0} MB: {1}
TranslationStrings.String: 硬盘上可用空间少于{0}兆字节: {1}

TranslationStrings.Key: Error saving image, disk space low!
TranslationStrings.String: 无法保存图像，硬盘空间过小！

TranslationStrings.Key: There was 1 change made to this toolblock. Would you like to review the changes made?
TranslationStrings.String: 此工具块有被改动，你想要核查所做的改动吗？

TranslationStrings.Key: There were {0} changes made to this toolblock. Would you like to review the changes made?
TranslationStrings.String: 此工具块有 {0} 个改动，你想要核查所做的改动吗？
拍照工具{0} 无法加载！
无法确认检查工具的版本
检查工具版本信息不匹配

TranslationStrings.Key: Camera {0} is not at IP Address {1}

TranslationStrings.String: 正在{0}程序中寻找插件类型 ...
循环使用模拟命令文件

TranslationStrings.Key: Force All Tools to Release Mode...
TranslationStrings.String: 将所有工具块设为发布(Release)模式...
禁用基于交易票据的通信方式
标准方式处理自动标定命令
自动标定取像等待时间
显示硬件触发调试信息

TranslationStrings.Key: Save Raw Images In PNG Format
Cannot read setup target. Place target in field of view and adjust focus.
TranslationStrings.String: 无法读取设置目标。请将目标件放在视野当中并调整使其聚焦。

TranslationStrings.Key: Cannot measure focus. Ensure target is in field of view.
TranslationStrings.String: 无法测量聚焦度。请确保目标件位于视野当中。

TranslationStrings.Key: Move target into position under the crosshairs.
TranslationStrings.String: 移动目标件至十字焦点处。

TranslationStrings.Key: Align the dashed line with the edges of the field of view
TranslationStrings.String: 将视野边缘与虚线对齐。
像机角度不正确。调整像机在安装平面上的角度（yaw）。
移动像机使之远离目标件
移动像机使之接近目标件
像机角度不正确。调整像机在垂直于安装平面上的角度（pitch）。
像机 {0} 设定文档创建完成!

TranslationStrings.Key: Recipe is not setup! You must set the golden values before continuing.
TranslationStrings.String: 设定文件未被设置！必须设定最佳值。

TranslationStrings.Key: Are you sure you want to create a recipe for camera {0}?
TranslationStrings.String: 确定创建为像机 {0} 设定文件？

TranslationStrings.Key: Recipe applied {1}. Recipe created {0} on this machine.
TranslationStrings.String: 配方生效时间为 {1}. 配方在本机的创建时间为 {0}.

TranslationStrings.Key: Are you sure you want to create a recipe for camera {0} config {1}?
TranslationStrings.String: 您是否确定要为像机{0}配置{1}创建配方?
正在为像机{0}配置{1}，{2}创建配方...
像机{0}配置{1}配方创建完毕！

TranslationStrings.Key: This camera is not ready according to the recipe! Are you sure you want to continue?
TranslationStrings.String: 根据配方判断，此像机尚未设置好！您确定要继续吗？
修改自动标定标准模板

TranslationStrings.Key: Inspection {0} was not loaded! Would you like to create a new inspection tool?
TranslationStrings.String: 检测{0}未加载！您想创建新检测工具吗？

TranslationStrings.Key: Note: Changes to the AcqFifo will not be saved when the framework exits.
TranslationStrings.String: 注：在AcqFifo上做的修改将不被存储，会于程序退出时丢失。

TranslationStrings.Key: Align Home2D to Motion2D at Image Center
TranslationStrings.String: 使图像中心在Home2D和Motion2D坐标相同

TranslationStrings.Key: Warning: Setting a minimum rotation span less than 5 degrees could result in inaccurate rotational calibration.
TranslationStrings.String: 警告：旋转角范围小于5度可能会使旋转中心标定不准确。

TranslationStrings.Key: Could not apply recipe because this fixture is more than 50% brighter than the golden fixture.
TranslationStrings.String: 不能使用配方，因为本机亮度比标准亮度超过50%。

TranslationStrings.Key: Could not apply recipe because this fixture is more than 50% darker than the golden fixture.
TranslationStrings.String: 不能使用配方，因为本机亮度比标准亮度低于50%。

TranslationStrings.Key: No calibration tool was loaded. Continuing will generate a new calibration tool for you. Would you like to generate an autocalibration tool? Press 'No' to generate a manual calibration toolblock.
TranslationStrings.String: 未加载标定工具。如继续，将生成新标定工具。您想创建自动标定工具块吗？选‘否'将生成手动标定工具块。

TranslationStrings.Key: Light controller {0} of type, {1}, could not be loaded. Falling back to type Cog_{1}
Inspection tool failed. Check inspection tool.
拍照工具失败， 无输入图像。检查标定工具。
Inspection tool requested while tools were unloaded. Reloading inspection tools...
Command {0} run inspection {1} failed duo to an exception {2}
Calibration tool failed. Check calibration tool.
An unknown exception occured during acquisition!
Light controller {0} failed to set multiple intensities!
Light controller {0} channel {1} failed to set a light intensity!
Light controller {0} channel {1} failed to turn on!
Light Controller {0} could not be initilaized!
Could not initialize light controller {0} because its type, {1}, could not be loaded!
Could not create Acqfifo for job {0}! Details: {1}
Light controller {0} multiple channels failed to turn off.

Are you about to reduce the memory size of inspection toolblocks. This operation could potentially corrupt your inspections or leave them inoperable. Please create a backup before continuing. Are you sure you want to continue?
